CakeLib

Contains common features and functionality used by the various Cake libraries.

Summary
CakeLibContains common features and functionality used by the various Cake libraries.
Console Logging
Variables
cake_indentContains the current indent level, this is for simple formatting purposes.
Functions
cake_indentIndents the output from the various Cake display functions.
cake_indentIndents the output from the various Cake display functions.
cake_outdentOutdents the output from the various Cake display functions.
cake_outdentOutdents the output from the various Cake display functions.
cake_spacerUses the current cake_indent level to create a HTML-formatter spacing.

cake_indent

Contains the current indent level, this is for simple formatting purposes.

Indents the output from the various Cake display functions.

Indents the output from the various Cake display functions.

cake_outdent

void cake_outdent(boolean display)

Outdents the output from the various Cake display functions.

cake_spacer

string cake_spacer()

Uses the current cake_indent level to create a HTML-formatter spacing.

cake_print

void cake_print(boolean display,
string message,
string color)

Optionally prints out a message in a given color.  This will be printed with the current indent as determined by the cake_indent functions.

Parameters

displayIf this is false, nothing is printed.
messageThe text message to display.
colorThe color to print out out the text.

cake_print

void cake_print(boolean display,
string message)

Optionally prints out a message in black.  This will be printed with the current indent as determined by the cake_indent functions.

Parameters

displayIf this is false, nothing is printed.
messageThe text message to display.

cake_print

void cake_print(string message,
string color)

Prints out a message in the given color.  This will be printed with the current indent as determined by the cake_indent functions.

Parameters

messageThe text message to display.
colorThe color to print out out the text.

cake_print

void cake_print(string message)

Prints out a message in black.  This will be printed with the current indent as determined by the cake_indent functions.

Parameters

messageThe text message to display.

cake_error

boolean cake_error(boolean display,
string message)

Optionally prints out an error message in red.  This will be printed with the current indent as determined by the cake_indent functions.

Parameters

displayIf this is false, nothing is printed.
messageThe text message to display.

Returns

This always returns false.

cake_error

boolean cake_error(string message)

Prints out an error message in red.  This will be printed with the current indent as determined by the cake_indent functions.

Parameters

messageThe text message to display.

Returns

This always returns false.

void cake_warning(boolean display,
string message)

Optionally prints out a warning message in red.  This will be printed with the current indent as determined by the cake_indent functions.

Parameters

displayIf this is false, nothing is printed.
messageThe text message to display.

Parameters

= messageThe text message to display.

Useful Functions

Summary
Functions
cake_get_current_effectsA map of all the effects the player currently has.

Functions

cake_get_current_effects

int [effect] cake_get_current_effects()

Returns

A map of all the effects the player currently has.  The value of the map is the number of turns remaining.
